geographical_features: access to the North Sea and the Baltic Sea; several large navigable rivers (Rhine, Weser, Elbe, Danube); moderate drinking water resources; diverse terrain including lowlands, mountain ranges, industrial regions, and major ports
climate: temperate, ranging from oceanic to continental depending on region
economic_strengths: New orders in manufacturing increased by 1.5% in October 2025. Inflation rate expected at +2.3% in November 2025. Employment remained almost unchanged in October 2025. Import prices decreased by 1.4% in October 2025 compared to October 2024. Frankfurt's DAX index closed at 24,028. Eurozone GDP growth revised to 0.3% in Q3. Deutsche Börse Group is engaged in discussions for a possible acquisition of Allfunds and has formed strategic partnerships with Kraken to bridge traditional and digital markets, and with AllUnity to expand stablecoin adoption in Europe.
army_size: approximately 180,000–200,000 active soldiers plus reserve forces
digitalization_level: high — advanced ICT infrastructure and widespread digitalization across industry and public administration
political_economic_threats: internal EU tensions and pressure for deeper integration; risk of EU fragmentation into groups with differing development speeds; global supply chain disruptions in critical raw materials and advanced technologies; increasing international industrial competition; export demand volatility due to global crises; demographic decline and population aging; migration pressures and associated socio-political risks
military_threats: increased instability in nearby regions; cyber and hybrid threats; risk of escalation of global tensions; need to adapt military capabilities to technological changes in modern conflict
development_milestones: Deutsche Börse Group is hosting its Capital Markets Day on December 10, 2025. The group is in exclusive discussions regarding a possible acquisition of Allfunds. Strategic partnerships have been announced with Kraken to bridge traditional and digital markets, and with AllUnity to expand stablecoin adoption in Europe.
